reviews.review:
Although I was very confused when I started with this game in the Half Life series, I still enjoyed it and even after 12+ years it was still fun for me (even though I only got it a year ago).

Edit: I started with this game and then played Half-Life 1 way after. I worded that confusingly
I love it and I definitely recommend getting it

Minha experiência nesse jogo foi muita insana pois sou muito Fã esta franquia de Half-life.
na minha opinião e melhor franquia da Valve, este jogo envolve muita ação, estratégias em combate, aventura que prende vc no mudo deste jogo.  

 RECOMENDO MUITO 100/10
Timeless classic that still feels unique to this day.

当看见评论说开快艇开到吐，我笑了；
然而当年少无知的我开了两个小时快艇的时候，大师，我悟了
Although it's mildly confusing for a smooth-brrained person like myself, it's still insanely good and fun
This is without a doubt the single greatest game ever made.
Haven't played this game since the original Xbox. So good to relive it on the PC!
So far it's very enjoyable and holds up despite it's age. However, I'm having to wait around half a minute when it's loading a new scene. I am running this off the HDD if that makes a difference.

Admitámoslo, tiene tanta crítica positiva solamente porque es la secuela del legendario Half-Life. Si este mismo juego tuviese otro nombre probablemente nadie lo conocería.
No voy a hacer spoilers pero al principio llegamos a una especie de estación de tren donde ya empezamos a ver que hay algo medio raro. Muchos soldados haciendo controles y algunas habitaciones con sangre. Acto seguido un viejo conocido te saca por una puerta trasera para que puedas llegar a escondidas al laboratorio a donde te dirigís. Así empecé a jugar este título. Jugué y jugué hasta que de repente me doy cuenta que estoy liderando una rebelión de "la resistencia" en contra de "la alianza". En ese punto pienso: ¿Qué carajo está pasando en este juego?.
Me parece un título que falló enormemente en el relato de la trama. Es como si el juego ni siquiera intentara explicarle al jugador lo que está sucediendo. Me encontré yendo de un lugar a otro sin entender el por qué de las cosas y teniendo que leer la trama en wikipedia una vez terminado el juego.
Disfruté muchísimo más el half life 1 (el remake Black Mesa en realidad). Ese si que es una joya.
Esta es una opinión muy personal. A lo mejor a vos te gusta. Después de todo la jugabilidad es divertida así que te lo recomiendo si:
1) Buscás un fps de ciencia ficción
2) No te importa jugar con motores gráficos viejos.

good for a playthrough though some GAMERS will not like due to its age being very apparent
better than bioshock in every way shape and form

Данный шедевр игровой индустрии рекомендую к прохождению.

Вспомните, что выходило в 2004? Новая часть GTA, Шрек 2, а теперь представьте реакцию игрового сообщества, когда в 2004 году вышла настолько инновационная игра. Лицевые анимации, графика, физика, сюжет... Все это поражает разум.

 Half-life 2 является для меня самой лучшей частью из всей серии Half-Life. Пройдя все части данной серии(кроме HL:Alyx), я с уверенностью могу это сказать.
[i] ...And if you see Dr. Breen, tell him I said "F#ck you!" [/i]
Very atmospheric, espically the bridge section
the only one in this game who didn't follow me like a dog [b]was[/b] dog.
ля ну спидраны  ван лав, прошел игру 2 раза так и не  надоела , класекааа
玩了一下，我觉得挺好玩的

λ

I finally got around to playing this (first time) after multiple years in my library. Despite its age it still holds up well as a very fun shooter. Lots of variation between levels (I would classify them as 'different gimmicks', but in a good way), lots of little hidden caches to look around and find. There were a couple spots I got sort of lost in but in general Valve did a really good job with the level design and lighting the areas you were supposed to be heading to next. Overall its a great game and worth playing at least once.

Wow. I am absolutely astonished that it took me 16 years to play this masterpiece. After beating Half-Life 1, Blue Shift, and Opposing Force and loving all 3 of them, I was skeptical on whether this game could top those amazing entries. It did. It most definitely did. Needless to say this game blew me out of the water, and even 16 years later it still lives up to all the hype surrounding it. I'm so glad I've finally gotten the chance to play this absolutely incredible game.
Why did you make this game? it is very bad :)
Fun game easy to learn basics.
Iconic game, but please release Half-Life 3
крутая игра я даже все эпизоды даже купил

曾经的V社告诉你如何用最简单的机制（射击游戏+物理学）做出几十年来都无人超越的经典。
看看那些年货FPS想什么扣的，白头菲尔德，杜牧，哈喽，每一作都会多一些花里胡哨的玩意儿。我half-life每一作都只有一个核心，物理学赛高！
o(╥﹏╥)o我特么好想在艾利克斯里用折凳大战抱脸虫啊
The game is so good, its a waste of time to read the reviews, just play the damn game already.

I remember playing this masterpiece on the original Xbox when I was a teenager. I am glad I was finally able to get it on PC.

This is one of the best FPS games I've ever played.


Sadly 99.9% the fan base is full of toxic cucks who love to bash people who don't have the same opinion as them. "The Half Life series doesn't need iron sights. Get cancer for having that opinion" 

Welp that's pretty much the HL2 community.

I would say buy this game it's worth every penny. But stay clear of the community if you don't want to deal with brainlet betas.
Eski bir oyun olmasına rağmen bazı en yeni oyunlardan daha kaliteli.

You dont gotta play it for very long to know that this is a good game. I love the story, the puzzles, the gameplay, and the overall atmosphere of the game. It is also very impressive that this game was made in the early 2000s and still is one of my favorite story games.
El mejor de la saga, por sus físicas, por todo lo que puedes hacer con la pistola anti gravedad y por los gráficos que tiene siendo que salió hace muchos años. Simplemente, un juegazo <3
I just beat the game for the first time, and wow I have no words. It a am amazed of how amazing this game is.
UNA VERDADERA OBRA DE ARTE Y TECNOLOGÍA, UN JUEGO DE CULTO

This is a classic. A gold old FPS with the elements that make the first FPS great. The narrative is great, not cut-scenes and the environment mix very well with the game play. One thing I've noted about these Valve's games, is that whenever you think you are in the wrong path, it's actually the opposite. The game is designed to lead you through your instincts, so you are almost never wrong in the path you choose.
Doesn't get Eddie Vedder than this.
